PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer gave a maximum PCE of 9.10% .

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PSCs (Passive Optical Network Shared Amplified Spans) |
| PffBX-TT:PC71BM (specific PFN, possibly a wavelength or a specific fiber) |
| Maximum PCE (Peak Power Transfer Efficiency) |
| Percentage (unit of measurement for PCE) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Maximum PCE (Peak Material Power Transfer Efficiency) |
| Percentage (unit of measurement for PCE) |

Note: PSCs and PffBX-TT:PC71BM are not material properties, but rather types of systems or components.

The entity "PSCs using PffBX-TT:PC71BM as an active layer" does not refer to a material property value. Instead, it refers to Passive Component Substitutes (PSCs) using a specific model (PffBX-TT:PC71BM) as an active layer.
